text: John Hurst (born November 23, 1933) is an American former sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:American male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of the United States Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles
title: John Hurst (sport shooter)
